attributes.action: We call on Government to abolish mandatory use of face coverings from 24/07/20.
attributes.additional_details: According to the Human Rights Acts 1998, Schedule 1, Article 2 our Right to Life is affected by being forced to wear a face covering as it prohibits us from breathing freely. Furthermore it is in breach with Article 3 of the same Human Rights Act as it is degrading the British Citizen. By forcing us to wear a mask, we are being debased (reduced to a lower quality being). This degrading causes us a loss of self-respect. It humiliates and demeans the status of our people - stop passive torture!
attributes.background: We call on the Government to abolish the mandatory use of face coverings from 24 July 2020. The Government is infringing on our Right to Life by breathing freely.
